summary: Unbeknownst to him, a soldier is sent on a doomed mission because of the high likelihood of him divulging secrets if captured and tortured.
cast: Suzy Parker|Bradford Dillman|Harry Andrews|Robert Stephens|Paul Rogers|John Welsh|Ronald Allen|A.J. Brown|Martin Boddey|Charles Lloyd Pack|Jacques Cey|John Dearth|Andre Charisse|Stephen Dartnell|David Palmer|Maurice Belfer|Meier Tzelniker|Richard Shaw|Roland Brand|Duncan Lamont|Walter Gotell|Tony Doonan|Arthur Gross|Michael Ripper|Brian Hankins|Basil Beale|Ernest Blyth|Jean Briant|Norman Coburn|Frank Forsyth|Jean Harvey|Richard Marner|George Mikell|Tony Quinn|John Serret|Michael Shaw|Theodore Wilhelm|Mickey Wood
title: Circle of Deception
